main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were sighted over Hahn Air Base in Germany on February 22, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, the size of a half dollar, and emitted no sound., A witness claimed to see about 40 objects making passes and pulling up vertically at high speeds., Witnesses reported seeing the objects for varying durations of time from 3 to 5 minutes., The sighting involved aircraft and the UFOs reportedly flew in a circular formation., The objects were noted to be silvery and comparable in size to an airliner.
sighted object: round white objects and multiple unidentified flying objects
witness description: A civilian, age 44, unemployed disabled veteran.
